timeline.bodyText: The migrator utilises the current Infinispan version to write to the target store, so this isn't really configurable, it will just be the Infinispan version associated with the CLI.
timeline.author: ryanemerson

timeline.bodyText: If this going to be the home of migrate configuration etc, the description should probably be just "Migration operations" similar to the Patch command.
timeline.author: ryanemerson
ryanemerson

timeline.bodyText:
is there a way to disable the auto-completion for threads and readBatch?
If I do double-tab, I got the following exception:
[pedro-laptop-3-56000@cluster//containers/default]> migrate cluster synchronize --threads=May 20, 2020 12:21:36 PM org.aesh.command.impl.AeshCommandRuntime doSimpleComplete
SEVERE: Runtime exception when completing: Buffer: migrate cluster synchronize --threads=, Cursor:38, Offset:0, IgnoreOffset:false, Append separator: true, Candidates:[]
java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: ""
	at java.base/java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.java:65)
	at java.base/java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:662)
	at java.base/java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:770)
	at org.aesh.command.impl.converter.IntegerConverter.convert(IntegerConverter.java:31)
	at org.aesh.command.impl.converter.IntegerConverter.convert(IntegerConverter.java:28)
	at org.aesh.command.impl.internal.ProcessedOption.doConvert(ProcessedOption.java:362)
	at org.aesh.command.impl.internal.ProcessedOption.injectValueIntoField(ProcessedOption.java:393)
	at org.aesh.command.impl.populator.AeshCommandPopulator.populateObject(AeshCommandPopulator.java:64)
	at org.aesh.command.impl.parser.AeshCommandLineCompletionParser.doInjectValues(AeshCommandLineCompletionParser.java:356)
	at org.aesh.command.impl.parser.AeshCommandLineCompletionParser.injectValuesAndComplete(AeshCommandLineCompletionParser.java:58)
	at org.aesh.command.impl.parser.AeshCommandLineParser.complete(AeshCommandLineParser.java:126)
	at org.aesh.command.impl.AeshCommandRuntime.doSimpleComplete(AeshCommandRuntime.java:332)
	at org.aesh.command.impl.AeshCommandRuntime.completeWithOperators(AeshCommandRuntime.java:278)
	at org.aesh.command.impl.AeshCommandRuntime.complete(AeshCommandRuntime.java:262)
	at org.aesh.readline.ReadlineConsole$AeshCompletion.complete(ReadlineConsole.java:409)
	at org.aesh.readline.ReadlineConsole$AeshCompletion.complete(ReadlineConsole.java:406)
	at org.aesh.readline.completion.CompletionHandler.createCompletionList(CompletionHandler.java:134)
	at org.aesh.readline.completion.CompletionHandler.complete(CompletionHandler.java:102)
	at org.aesh.readline.action.mappings.Complete.accept(Complete.java:62)
	at org.aesh.readline.Readline$AeshInputProcessor.parse(Readline.java:235)
	at org.aesh.readline.Readline$AeshInputProcessor.access$100(Readline.java:174)
	at org.aesh.readline.Readline.readInput(Readline.java:95)
	at org.aesh.readline.Readline.access$1000(Readline.java:57)
	at org.aesh.readline.Readline$AeshInputProcessor.lambda$start$1(Readline.java:324)
	at org.aesh.terminal.EventDecoder.accept(EventDecoder.java:118)
	at org.aesh.terminal.EventDecoder.accept(EventDecoder.java:31)
	at org.aesh.terminal.io.Decoder.write(Decoder.java:133)
	at org.aesh.readline.tty.terminal.TerminalConnection.openBlocking(TerminalConnection.java:216)
	at org.aesh.readline.tty.terminal.TerminalConnection.openBlocking(TerminalConnection.java:203)
	at org.aesh.readline.ReadlineConsole.accept(ReadlineConsole.java:243)
	at org.aesh.readline.ReadlineConsole.accept(ReadlineConsole.java:87)
	at org.aesh.readline.tty.terminal.TerminalConnection.init(TerminalConnection.java:153)
	at org.aesh.readline.tty.terminal.TerminalConnection.<init>(TerminalConnection.java:86)
	at org.aesh.readline.tty.terminal.TerminalConnection.<init>(TerminalConnection.java:96)
	at org.aesh.readline.ReadlineConsole.start(ReadlineConsole.java:183)
	at org.infinispan.cli.commands.CLI.interactive(CLI.java:203)
	at org.infinispan.cli.commands.CLI.exec(CLI.java:152)
	at org.infinispan.cli.commands.CliCommand.execute(CliCommand.java:32)
	at org.infinispan.cli.commands.CliCommand.execute(CliCommand.java:14)
	at org.aesh.command.impl.operator.EndOperator.execute(EndOperator.java:41)
	at org.aesh.command.impl.Executions$ExecutionImpl.execute(Executions.java:213)
	at org.aesh.command.impl.AeshCommandRuntime.executeCommand(AeshCommandRuntime.java:161)
	at org.aesh.AeshRuntimeRunner.execute(AeshRuntimeRunner.java:118)
	at org.infinispan.cli.commands.CLI.main(CLI.java:252)

The only way I found to "fix" it was to create a converter:
   public Integer convert(ConverterInvocation converterInvocation) {
      String value = converterInvocation.getInput();
      if (value == null || value.isEmpty()) {
         return null;
      }
      return Integer.parseInt(value);
   }
timeline.author: pruivo
